item.description:
This comical bubble show features a bubbleologist who creates little bubbles, round bubbles, bouncing bubbles, and even square bubbles. A mesmerizing & interactive bubble performance! Children will even get a chance to stand inside their very own bubble! Tickets are $10 per child and $2 per adult and include exclusive Jam Time admission from 9am-12pm

jamtime.com
978-897-2917

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: "Bubble Show" at "Jam Time" in Maynard,MA
